Allowed Values: Plain text, must be formatted as a valid URI
Description: Uniform Resource Indicators (URIs) for each song listed in the dataset on Spotify.
The artists performing each song in the dataset, listed in order from the main artist to the featured artist(s).
The title of each song in the dataset.
The year each song in the dataset was released.
Indicator for whether the song was in the top 100 songs on Spotify in 2022.
Indicator for whether the song was in the top 100 songs on TikTok in 2022.
The song's highest position on the Spotify top charts in 2022.
The amount of weeks each song was on the Spotify charts.
The song's popularity on TikTok, out of 100.
The artist's popularity on TikTok, out of 100 and calculated on average from their songs' popularity.
Each song's score in the "Danceability" index on Organize Your Music.
Each song's score in the "Energy" index on Organize Your Music.
Each song's score in the "Loudness" index, in decibels, on Organize Your Music.
Each song's score in the "Speechiness" index on Organize Your Music.
Each song's score in the "Acousticness" index on Organize Your Music.
Each song's score in the "Instrumentalness" index on Organize Your Music.
Each song's score in the "Liveness" index on Organize Your Music.
The song's tempo in beats per minute (BPM).
